name: D3fine
description: React app made to allow users to create personality assessments. Full CRUD / Firebase Authentication (mobile styling on the way!).
tech: React.js, Node.js, Mongoose, MongoDB, Express.js, Google Firebase, JavaScript, HTML, CSS

name: StopJockin
description: Stop Jockin is a platform for New Orleans local business owner , 'Joc' , used to display many of his business ventures! This app utilizes a React front-end framework, connected to a backend API that allows admin users to manage rendered data.
tech: React.js, Node.js, Mongoose, MongoDB, Express.js, JavaScript, HTML, CSS

name: Collarchive
description: A CRUD app that gives users the ability to digitally log a physical collection they own. The demo features items from my own personal collection!
tech: EJS, Node.js, Mongoose, MongoDB, Express.js, JavaScript, HTML, CSS

name: Gym Planner
description: A straightforward web app that gives users the ability to digitally plan, track and optimize their workouts. Each signed in user will get their own database of manually entered routines and exercises.

name: Avatar Yearbook
description: A digital yearbook for members of the General Assembly SEIR 'Avatar' Cohort.
tech: React.js, Node.js, Mongoose, MongoDB, Express.js, Google Firebase, JavaScript, HTML, CSS

name: Black In Gaming
description: A tribute to representation in gaming, and a detailed database of black characters featured in video games!
tech: Angular, PayloadCMS, TypeScript, Mongoose, MongoDB, HTML, CSS

name: SVGeezy
description: A Scalable Vector Graphic (SVG) gallery created through an Angular Framework. The goal for this app is to amass a collection of SVG images with direct svg pathing for devs to use for their projects.

name: What2Play
description: A web app that gives users a randomized game suggestion based on the genre they're in the mood for!
